name: Battle Car Tycoon: Idle Merge games
name_original: Battle Car Tycoon: Idle Merge games
description:
Play the best addictive game. Have you ever wanted to own garage full of battle cars? You have this opportunity in our new merge games.

Become racing team owner, merge plane, car or bus, buy new and race for money. Improve all garage - upgraded cars get more money. You can also expand - unlock new car parking places and have more cars.

How can you enjoy playing Battle Car Tycoon?
- Buy cars and give them neon or steampunk style
- Merge the same cars together into better advanced one
- Build racing team
- Earn money for each finished race circuit
- Expand and gain new parking slot
- Improve your battle cars to get more money in race

Play Car Merger and start your marge car adventure now.

Created by Noxgames 2019
developers: NOXGAMES - free big head puppet sports
